tech_news.title: Microsoft Down for Thousands of Users, Downdetector Reports - gvwire.com
tech_news.description: Thousands of users reported issues with Microsoft services including Outlook, Microsoft 365, and Microsoft Teams due to an outage.

tech_news.title: Xbox Developer_Direct 2026 Recap: Everything Revealed, Including a Surprise New Double Fine Game - Xbox Wire
tech_news.description: Developer_Direct just brought us gameplay and insights for Fable, Forza Horizon 6, Beast of Reincarnation, and the surprise new Double Fine game, Kiln. Find out everything you need to know inside.

tech_news.title: Creation and Destruction: How Double Fine’s Kiln Combines Pottery with Brawling - Xbox Wire
tech_news.description: Double Fine’s newest creation has been revealed at Developer_Direct! We talk with Project Lead Derek Brand to learn more about Kiln, a team-based multiplayer party brawler – with pottery!

tech_news.title: Forza Horizon 6: More Details on The Country, The Culture and The Cars of Playground Games’ Japan - Xbox Wire
tech_news.description: Forza Horizon 6 is coming on May 19 - find out more about the cars and culture of Playground Games' Japan in our huge Developer_Direct interview.

tech_news.title: Yakuza 3 Remake Ugly Alleyway Has Fans Concerned - Kotaku
tech_news.description: It seems like a technical issue is causing the spot to look bad and a modder may have already fixed it

tech_news.title: AMD Fires Back At Intel Panther Lake: Shows How Its Ryzen AI MAX & Ryzen AI 400/300 CPU Will Compete & Win Against Core Ultra Series 3 - Wccftech
tech_news.description: AMD showcases Ryzen AI MAX CPUs outperforming Intel's Panther Lake in premium, mainstream, and entry-level segments ahead of launch.

tech_news.title: Claude Code is suddenly everywhere inside Microsoft - The Verge
tech_news.description: Microsoft is increasingly adopting Claude Code, despite selling its own GitHub Copilot AI tool. Microsoft’s developers are now testing out both to compare them.

tech_news.title: Sony announces its first turntables in years - The Verge
tech_news.description: The PS-LX3BT and PS-LX5BT turntables will come out in February and April, respectively, and are aimed at new and existing vinyl fans alike.

tech_news.title: Google adds your Gmail and Photos to AI Mode to enable "Personal Intelligence" - Ars Technica
tech_news.description: Personal Intelligence is optional and rolling out first to AI Pro and AI Ultra subscribers.
